en_question: A vat contains 500 gallons of beer with an initial alcohol concentration of \(4\%\) by volume. Beer with an alcohol concentration of \(6\%\) is added to the vat at a rate of \(5\) gal/min, while the mixture is removed at the same rate, ensuring a constant volume in the vat. Calculate the percentage of alcohol in the vat after an hour. Provide your answer as a percentage to four significant figures.
